attributes.action: Block open borders and EU membership with Turkey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The complete political madness to consider open borders between the EU and Turkey must be banned. The long-term effects of such open border policy would be the final low-down on the gradual destruction of European culture, public safety, human and civil rights and values.
The encouragement of positive changes to civil rights must instead be done in the manner we trade with countries like Turkey - not by opening our borders with the country.
